description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into snow at will.

abilities.description: Creates a solid snow wall to block doorways and paths.
User completely transforms into snow and surrounds an opponent's body with the snow, weakening and immobilizing them with severe cold.
User freezes the feathers on their wings, transforming them into sharpened solid snow-blades capable of clashing with swords.

weaknesses.description: Like all Logia users, can be harmed by Busoshoku Haki as demonstrated by Tashigi.
Snow can be melted by heat, making fire and heat-based abilities effective counters.

keyMoments.description: Monet uses Yuki Gaki to create a snow wall barrier.
keyMoments.significance: First animated use of this defensive technique.

keyMoments.description: Monet employs Mannen Yuki to immobilize opponents with freezing snow.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the fruit's signature ability to incapacitate enemies.

keyMoments.description: Monet transforms her wing feathers into ice blades using Tabira Yuki: Hada Gatana.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the versatility of snow manipulation for offensive combat.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to sprout replicas of their body parts on any surface.

abilities.description: Manifests four arms to strike opponents with multiple simultaneous attacks.

keyMoments.description: Robin uses Cuatro Mano: Spank against Monet in combat.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's combat application of her powers in the Punk Hazard arc.
